location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter No. 90 from Ephraim Gerrish Stannus, Resident at Bushire to William Newnham, Chief Secretary to Government, Political Department, Bombay

mods.abstract: Letter, dated 26 December 1826, submitting a statement of expenses incurred during Stannus's absence on duty from the Residency for the sanction of the Government of Bombay.Statement of expenses incurred during the Resident's tour to the Arabian Coast between 4 September and 14 November 1826, signed and dated by Colonel Stannus 27 December 1826.
